meanings.definition: A person who opposes official policy, especially that of an authoritarian state.
meanings.sent1: The dissidents bravely spoke out against the government's unfair rules.

meanings.sent4: In the sea of conformity, the dissidents stood out like bright stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The image of the dissidents marching with banners will forever be etched in my memory.
